title: Shumyl
author: Shumyl
content: What do you think about what is the feature of Bitcoin, can Bitcoin touch $50,000 in 2025? I think that Bitcoin will go to $50,000 but not in 2025, maybe in 2026.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Are you afraid to buy bitcoin? Thinking that its price may fall if you buy it now? Do not be afraid and do not sell if the price is decreasing because the price will later increase and you will make money from it. Quote from: Shumyl on September 25, 2023, 07:30:10 AMCan Bitcoin touch $50,000 in 2025? I think that Bitcoin will go to $50,000 but not in 2025, maybe in 2026.The least that I am expecting by 2025 is $100000 but I am guessing that bitcoin price could have gotten to $170000 before 2026.

comments.author: PIMPdev
comments.body: That's really bearish prediction. I wonder why. I mean, I don't think that BTC will hit $1,000,000 in a few years, but only $50,000 by 2025? Nah.

comments.author: Z_MBFM
comments.body: Quote from: Shumyl on September 25, 2023, 07:30:10 AMWhat do you think about what is the feature of Bitcoin, can Bitcoin touch $50,000 in 2025? I think that Bitcoin will go to $50,000 but not in 2025, maybe in 2026.$50k seems possible in 2025. Because Bitcoin has already crossed $68k once so crossing $50k is not a big challenge for Bitcoin. Bitcoin is a very potential currency for the future.  Bitcoin is constantly making great records and so Bitcoin will make a record in the future that we cannot even imagine. Bitcoin's popularity is increasing because it is completely decentralized, so its transactions cannot be deleted in any way. A bank account can be hacked, bank servers can be hacked, physical money can be stolen, but Bitcoin is almost impossible to hack if it is kept in a non-custodial wallet or a hardware wallet. And there is no accountability for using or trading Bitcoin. If you keep huge money in the bank, you have to show the source of income for it, but in Bitcoin, huge amount of money can be kept hidden. And that's why Bitcoin is very popular with almost everyone and its popularity will continue to increase in the future

comments.body: Bitcoin's key features include decentralization, security via blockchain technology, limited supply (21 million coins), and peer-to-peer transactions without intermediaries.

I think that Bitcoin will go to $50,000 but not in 2025, maybe in 2026.Everyone can make predictions based on his expectations and calculations but I think it is low. Bitcoin has always exceeded its past ATH in any bull run, so I am expecting the coin to at least be above the last ATH of  $69,045.00 next year. Maybe the price might settle at $50,000 after the bull run. I can't really predict what the price will be in 2024 and 2025 because many unpredictable events will affect the price. The US election, the approach of the new president towards Bitcoin, and the state of the global economy amongst others will play some key factors in 2025-2026.

What should be considered as a thing is the price it’ll fall back to after the bullish shift in price. After hitting 50k for instance will it drop down to 20k again? With the rate at which users and investors are talking about the next bullish run, it sounds to me as a take your profit investment plan. Once the price rises everyone pulls back their investment and profit, causing an early bearish market. Quote from: Shumyl on September 25, 2023, 07:30:10 AMWhat do you think about what is the feature of Bitcoin, can Bitcoin touch $50,000 in 2025? I think that Bitcoin will go to $50,000 but not in 2025, maybe in 2026.This is just speculation and I don’t have a personal exact prediction for the price of bitcoin, but the possibility of bitcoin hitting $75k is there because it’s beginning to trend that bitcoin will pump, but the investment outcome may not be like the 2021 bullish run, as a lot of people who lost money during that period may not throw money into bitcoin again. The crypto market crisis; hacks, rug pulls, etc have taken away multiple investors out of the market. Couple with the fact that these crisis keep happening often during the bull run. People are expected to stay careful, especially those who don’t understand the market. Unless a fresh audience of investors comes to try bitcoin, I see a lesser turn up from those that bought bitcoin at 50k and lost it all down to 20k+.
